channel.title: Some of the projects I have worked on on Marco Vásquez
channel.description: Recent content in Some of the projects I have worked on on Marco Vásquez

item.title: Image segmentation on water bodies
item.description: In this project I developed an AI model for image segmentation focused on water bodies.

item.title: Mango Leaf Classifier
item.description: Mango-Leaf is an innovative platform which uses Artificial Intelligence to detect if a mango leave is either healthy or showing signs of disease.

item.title: MusIkA
item.description: The while title is: “MusIkA: Tool for predicting the potential popularity of Pop/Rock genre songs on digital platforms using Artificial Intelligence” and it is the project I worked on as my thesis.
